history.content:
I'd say 170 and 127 are both pretty comparable to a non-Sahai 70 semester; 61c is heavier, but probably lighter than Hilfinger's 61b. None of these classes are especially difficult compared to the lower divs, imo.

This is doable for sure, but it's also heavier than what you've taken so far.

I'd say 170 and 127 are both pretty comparable to a non-Sahai 70 semester; 61c is heavier. None of these classes are especially difficult compared to the lower divs, imo.

This is doable for sure, but it's also heavier than what you've taken so far.

I saw a similar post this, but didn't find any that helpful answers over there. But does anyone have advice on how 61C, EECS 127 and CS 170 would be together, in terms of workload and also considering recruiting.

For reference, in terms of workload I have taken are 16B (Sahai) + 61B (Hilfinger) [both in same semester] and 70 also with Sahai this semester. 

Any advice would be highly appreciated!

Thanks a lot
history.subject: 61C + 127 + 170
